tool_description: Generates detailed interpretations for astrological aspects and aspect patterns, explaining their psychological and life manifestations.

major_aspects.description: List of major aspects (e.g., 'Sun conjunct Moon').

aspect_patterns.description: Major aspect patterns like Grand Trine, T-Square.

interpretation_style.description: Interpretation approach: psychological, predictive, or balanced.

error_messages: Invalid aspect format: Aspects must follow format 'Planet1 aspect Planet2' (e.g., 'Sun conjunct Moon').
Unrecognized aspect type: Use standard aspects (conjunct, sextile, square, trine, opposition).
Too many aspects: Maximum 50 aspects can be processed at once.
usage: Input major aspects and any detected patterns, choose interpretation style to receive comprehensive aspect meanings and their life implications.

overall_aspect_theme.description: Summary of dominant themes from aspect analysis

challenging_aspects.description: List of potentially challenging aspects and growth opportunities
